description:
This beautiful apartment is located on a high floor of the iconic Lemonade Building in the centre of Barking offering beautiful views over Central London.

The apartment comprises of a spacious living room with open plan kitchen and a balcony, a double bedroom with a built-in wardrobe, modern bathroom and a storage place.

The residents benefit from a concierge service and central heating.

Heating and Water are included in the rental.

The property is ideally positioned close to all shops and amenities, a library, a new health centre, outdoor spaces and piazzas as well as a gym.

1 Minute to Barking Tube Rail Station served by c2c, District and Hammersmith & City Lines which will take you in 25 minutes to Canary Wharf and 20 minutes to Central London.
name: 1 bed flat to rent

description:
Recently refurbished 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom 2nd floor flat located in a soughtafter Fulham location just a short distance from Chelsea.

Stunning, recently refurbished two bedroom
apartment. Situated on the second floor, this superb property boasts a reception room with wood floors and a vaulted ceiling and fitted storage. There is a modern fully fitted kitchen, a master bedroom with fitted wardrobes and an ensuite bathroom with a bath and separate shower, a second double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a shower. Excellent natural light is a key feature of this property.

Avalon Road is a cul-de-sac situated south off the
Kings Road where there is a wealth of bars,
restaurants and shops close by. Fulham Broadway
underground station is 0.3 miles away and Parsons Green underground station is 0.5 miles away.<br /><br />

Gray's Inn Road boasts a desired location amid ample tourist attractions such as Charles Dickens Museum and The British Museum. Popular West-end bars, cafes, and restaurants are nearby, as are Russell Square and Chancery Lane stations.

Please use the reference CHPK0306003 when contacting Foxtons.

name: 1 bed flat to rent

description:
We offer custom pricing for any duration. Rates may vary upon exact move in and move out dates.

The rate for this home starts at £3,130* / mo. Please visit our website and enter your dates of stay to see up-to-date pricing for your specific booking.

*Price quoted is: (1) based on moving in the first day the unit becomes available, (2) applicable only if billed upfront; can be higher if billed in multiple payments, (3) exclusive of any taxes or utilities.

Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this roomy St. James's furnished one-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and exquisite living room with great views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that London has to offer! (id #LON303)

Designed with you in mind

Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “i’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your charming living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this St. James's apartment has to offer. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Sleeping arrangements

  • Queen Bed, 63in/160cm


Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom include an on-site:
  • Dryer
  • Washing machine


Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.

Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Other things to note

This Blueground apartment has flexible lease options, allowing you to book it for a few months, a year, or more.
Please keep in mind that this is a walk up building.
We take great pride in ensuring every photo displayed is shot in our own apartments with our actual furnishings. That said, we regularly refresh our decor and furniture arrangement, which may differ from what’s pictured.

Also note

  • This apartment faces the street
  • There are stairs leading up to the entrance of this apartment, but no elevator
  • The apartment is supplied with a MiFi device that offers a personal internet connection
name: 1 bed flat to rent

address: Kitson House, Lime Quarter, Bow E3
description:
Two bedroom, two bathroom apartment on the 9th floor with balcony in the sought after Kitson House development. This contemporary home features a fully fitted open plan kitchen (integrated appliances), living and dining area, as well as hallway storage and quadruple glazing. Located in the vibrant Bow where old and new mixes together, residents will benefit from easy transport connections, a great choice of amenities for your everyday needs and when the city life gets extra stressful green spaces are all around the development for nice strolls.

Good local amenities are available within a short walk, including a supermarket, newsagent, and gym. The development includes a unique working space for residents, and benefits from being adjacent to Devon’s Road DLR station, which provides easy access to the surrounding areas of Canary Wharf, the City, Docklands, Spitalfields and Shoreditch. Bromley by Bow Underground station is within a 10 minute walk, allowing for travel further into London and beyond by overground services or by air (from City Airport).
features: Moments to Devons Road DLR Station

name: 1 bed flat to rent

description:
Detailed Description

A delightful, newly refurbished two bedroom apartment located on the upper ground floor of this Victorian Conversion.

This property is presented beautifully throughout and comprises of two double bedrooms, open plan living room & kitchen with a large bay window and a fully tiled bathroom. The kitchen is fully fitted and has handle-less cabinetry for a modern and stylish look.

Located within walking distance to Catford and Catford Bridge stations as well as many bus lines, shops and amenities via Rushey Green and Lewisham High Street.

This property is available unfurnished and on a long-term basis if required. The property benefits from on street parking.
name: 2 bed flat to rent

description:
A one bedroom one bathroom apartment (577 sq.ft) with north east aspect positioned on the third floor of Colindale Gardens, located behind beautifully landscaped gardens.

This apartment consists of interior layouts which have been carefully designed to maximise space and flexibility, complemented by a stylish, high quality specification. Engineered wood flooring to hallway, kitchen, living, dining area. Interior designed fitted kitchens with Siemens integrated appliances. A well proportioned bedroom with a modern bathroom suite. This property also offers a beautiful private balcony. Residents benefit from access to residents only gym, sauna, steam room, Concierge service and Landscaped gardens.

Easy access to the City (30 mins by tube – Colindale to Bank) and West End (25 mins – Colindale to Tottenham Court Road). 5 mins walk to Colindale Tube station (Northern Line). Local supermarkets include a Tesco Metro and Sainsbury’s Local, an Asda superstore (0.7 miles) and Morrisons (0.6 miles).

**please note no car parking space is included **
name: 1 bed flat to rent

address: Emerson Bainbridge House, Cleveland Street, Fitzrovia W1T
description:
Newly refurbished – Hugely spacious and unique (667 sq. Ft) lower ground one bedroom apartment. This property comprises a bedroom with built in wardrobes, one bathroom with heated towel rails, stylish fitted kitchen with smeg/Siemen’s integrated appliances, open plan reception room which leads onto a terrace with two lockable vaults. The apartment also benefits from wooden flooring throughout, underfloor heating, air conditioning and video intercom.

This boutique development has been newly refurbished throughout to an exceptional standard while keeping lots of the original features.

Full of character, the Grade II listed Emerson Bainbridge House stands proudly at the heart of London’s much sought after Fitzrovia district in the Borough of Westminster. Its charming heritage features have been lovingly preserved in the development of 13 superb studio (2), one (3), and two bedroomed (8) apartments. Combining style and quality, this is a rare opportunity to realise an exceptional standard of contemporary living in one of the world’s greatest capital cities.

London’s retail experience is unlike any other and, from Emerson Bainbridge House in Fitzrovia, all of it is on your doorstep. An easy walk takes you to the shoppers’ delights of Oxford Street, Bond Street and Tottenham Court Road. A short taxi ride across Hyde Park and you will find the exclusive designer names and prestige stores of Knightsbridge and Mayfair.
features: Grade II listed Emerson Bainbridge House
Terrace or balcony with all apartment

agentAddress: Unit 11, Commodore House, Juniper Drive, Battersea Reach
description:
Highly appealing 593ft2 riverside apartment with luxurious furnishing, integrated appliances & nearby transport links.

This first floor riverside apartment boasts a high quality finish, luxurious furnishing & attractive views over the courtyard / landscaped gardens. Measuring approximately 593ft2, accommodation comprises a well-proportioned double bedroom, immaculate bathroom, stylish open-plan reception with dining area & fully-equipped modern kitchen. The sleek interior features fitted Zanussi appliances, electric heating system, floor-to-ceiling windows & separate utility / storage cupboards.

Battersea Reach is a sought-after riverside development, located moments from the transport links of Wandsworth Town & Clapham Junction. Residents benefit from 24-hour concierge & an exclusive gym, as well as on-site amenities like Tesco Express, Young's Bar & Restaurant, Caserta Italian Café, yue float wellness centre, healthcare clinic & beauty salon. Council tax band E.
name: 1 bed flat to rent

description:
This well-appointed and generously sized one-bedroom apartment is nestled in the heart of Lower Clapton, boasting convenient access to an array of transport options and a variety of local conveniences just moments away.

Featuring a spacious split-level layout within a Victorian conversion, this property includes one large double bedroom, an expansive open-plan living area with a fully equipped kitchen, and a beautifully tiled bathroom complete with a shower and WC. The apartment is enhanced by ample storage cupboards and tasteful neutral decor throughout.

Situated in a serene residential neighborhood, the apartment is just a short stroll from Lower Clapton Station, surrounded by a vibrant selection of bars, cafes, and restaurants. It benefits from excellent public transportation connectivity, including several bus routes facilitating easy travel within and beyond London.

The local area offers a rich blend of cultural and recreational spots. Positioned between Millfields Park and Clapton Roundabout, the apartment is conveniently close to notable Hackney landmarks. The Princess of Wales Pub, Hackney Marshes, and the picturesque River Lea are all within a brief walking distance, providing ample leisure and exploration opportunities.
features: Newly renovated one-bedroom apartment in the heart of Lower Clapton

Ample storage space and neutral decor throughout
Prime position in Lower Clapton, heart of convenience and connectivity
Situated in a peaceful residential area, a short walk from Lower Clapton Stationn

description:
Description

Available now
- video available -

This bright three bedroom semi-detached house nestled in the heart of Northolt, is situated on a peaceful residential street. The property covers two floors. The ground floor has a separate well-equipped kitchen, a separate WC and a spacious living room with French doors that open onto the rear garden. The first floor offers two full size double bedrooms, one with an ensuite, a single bedroom and a full size family bathroom.

The property additionally benefits from off-street parking, central heating throughout and a newly carpeted top floor.

Conveniently located, this home offers easy access to a range of local amenities, including shops, restaurants, schools, and parks. Within the catchment area of several highly regarded schools including Gifford Primary and Greenford High School.

Commuters will appreciate the proximity to transport links, with Northolt Tube Station (Central Line), Southall Station (Elizabeth Line) and bus routes within easy reach, facilitating swift travel to Heathrow, Central London and surrounding areas.

Deposit: £2,535

Outside there is a front garden with a side shared driveway and the rear garden. Further benefits include gas central heating and hard flooring throughout.

description:
Two double bedroom ground floor flat with gas central heating, double glazing, and video entry phone system. Offered chain free. Ideal investment opportunity. Heathfield Close is walking distance from Darkes Lane with local shops and railway station.

Double glazed communal entrance door opening into communal entrance hall.

Front door with spyhole opening into:

Lounge /Dining Room

Laminate wood effect flooring. Double glazed window to rear. TV aerial point. Double radiator. Single radiator. Built in shelf cupboard. Wall mounted video entry receiver. Two built in shelf cupboards.

Kitchen

Range of wood grain wall and base units featuring cupboards and drawers. Granite effect working surfaces. One and a half bowl stainless steel sink and mixer tap. Four ring gas hob. With electric turbo oven below and extractor hood above. Integrated fridge freezer, washing machine, Tiled floor. Tiled splashbacks. Wall mounted Worcester gas central heating boiler. Double glazed window to front.

Bedroom One

Double glazed window to rear overlooking grounds. Built in cupboards. Single radiator.

Bedroom Two

Double glazed window to front. Single radiator. Built in cupboard.

Bathroom

White suite comprising bath with shower mixer. Top flush WC. Shower base with glass door. Pedestal wash basin. Tiled walls. Tiled floor. Obscure double glazed window to front. Double radiator.

Exterior

Extensive communal gardens. Parking is provided around the cul de sac.

12 month tenancy
Deposit £1673
Council Tax Band D - Hertsmere Council
